issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Android configuration was previously valid according to Titanium SDK 3.1.3 but when I upgrade my SDK to 3.2.0, it is saying 'An Adnroid SDK is missing. Titanium requres Android platform 5.0'. However, I have configure the correct SDK path in platform preferences. And native Android development is working fine. 

Please resolve this issue ASAP. As some other developers also experienced this issue http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/160774/an-android-sdk-is-missing

h3. Actual Result
Showing red cross mark on Android SDK

h3. Expected Result
Should show green check mark on Android SDK

comments.body:
Please confirm that you have upgraded Titanium Studio, CLI and SDK to 3.2.0 GA version. If you are running into this issue with Studio after upgrading all components to 3.2.0 GA release, please type the following command and attach the output. It would help us narrow down the problem.

titanium info

With the update of titanium SDK, I also updated CLI but it did not fix this issue. 

Resolution:
============
I fixed this issue by uninstalling Titanium studio 3.1.3 in which SDK 2.1.2, 3.1.3 and 3.2.0 were installed and then download and reinstall updated version of Titanium studio 3.2.0 from appcelerator.com. And now it is working also for Android platform.


PS : It would be great for other developers if concern department admits and work on this bug of Ti.
[~mohsin1303] Thank you for your feedback. Its much appreciated. Glad to know that things worked out for you. Engineering is very much aware,investigating and actively working to solve any issues.
